Tracking resources for the 2020 Wallbridge(13-4) fire.

This is a list of resources for tracking the Sonoma County fires, specifically the Wallbridge fire.

Scanners

These scanners have been most useful in terms of tracking where firefighters have been concentrating their efforts, which could be interpereted as the area of highest risk.

- Sonoma CAL FIRE
- All Sonoma County Scanners

Maps

- Aerial traffic, including tankers
- Sonoma County Incident Map (includes evacuation zones)
- Wind speed and direction map
- SF Chronicle Fire Map

Webcams

Looking north from Mt Jackson. You can see part of the Wallbridge fire is on the left: http://api.nvseismolab.org/camera/Axis-Jackson2

Twitter Accounts

- Sonoma Sheriff
- Official County of Sonoma
- Sonoma County Scanner Updates
- CAL FIRE

Alerts

- Sonoma Sheriff via Nixle

Misc

Information Phone #: (707) 967-4207
